supportDesc: Click here to support the project or get updates!
devDescFull: System Modifier & WebUI Developer. I create things that make your device run smoother and hotter.
toastReset: Battery temp is back to normal

aggressive.title: Aggressive Mode
aggressive.text: Highly recommended for a massive performance boost! Turn it off immediately if you play games with strict anti-cheat to avoid bans.

modeOptions.title: Operation Mode
modeOptions.text:
Auto: Thermal limits are only disabled for the apps you pick in the Apps tab.

Static: Permanently disabled all the time.

zonePolicy.title: Thermal Policy
zonePolicy.text: Sets how the kernel reacts when temps hit a certain limit. Just leave it on default if you're not sure.

batterySpoof.title: Battery Spoofing
batterySpoof.text:
‚ö†Ô∏è DANGER ‚ö†Ô∏è
Fakes your battery temp reading so the system won't drop frames. Might degrade battery life over time. ONLY USE THIS WHILE GAMING, and RESET it when you're done!
